articles.title: Leaders gather for Arab-Islamic summit in Qatar after Israel's Doha attack
articles.description: An Arab-Islamic summit is being held in Doha, Qatar, following an Israeli airstrike in the city. The attack has been condemned by Qatar's Prime Minister, who stated that it has 'killed any hope' for the release of Gaza hostages.

articles.title: Massive nationalist rally shows MAGA-fueled movement's appeal in U.K.
articles.description: Over 110,000 people participated in a rally in London organized by anti-migrant extremist Tommy Robinson. The event, described as the largest far-right rally in U.K. history, turned violent and is seen by experts as evidence of the growing appeal of a MAGA-fueled movement in the United Kingdom.

articles.title: FBI's Patel faces US congressional hearings after Kirk death probe missteps
articles.description: FBI Deputy Director Kash Patel is set to face congressional hearings regarding perceived missteps in the investigation into the death of conservative commentator Charlie Kirk. The handling of the probe has drawn criticism and raised questions that will be addressed in the upcoming hearings.
